initial:
An audio is connected to a html component using one of the following methods:
Konekti.media(id, media, type, src)
Konekti.audio(id, type, src)
Konekti.mp3(id, src)
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the audio
mediaMedia type (set to 'audio' for audios)
typeAudio type
srcURL of the audio
